sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Move ML definition to new schema</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) { /* OOB Solution definitions need to be skipped if plugin uses other than com.glide.platform_ml plugin in the if folder to checkin OOB solution definition. There is problem of overriding the OOB solution definition sys_id with sequence in which plugins are installed. OOB Solution Definition NlU 'ml_setup_topics_model', 'ml_sn_itsm_nlu_itsm_nlu_for_va', 'ml_sn_csm_nlu_customer_service_nlu_model', 'ml_sn_hr_nlu_hr_nlu'
CSM contextual search 'ml_sn_global_all_similar_cases', 'ml_sn_global_recommended_resolved_cases', 'ml_sn_global_major_issue_detector', 'ml_sn_global_recommended_open_cases', 'ml_sn_global_articles_similar_to_cases', 'ml_sn_global_knowledge_similar_articles'
ITSM contextual search 'ml_sn_global_similar_open_incidents', 'ml_sn_global_similar_resolved_incidents', 'ml_sn_global_similar_incidents', 'ml_sn_global_articles_similar_to_incidents', 'ml_sn_global_major_incident_recommendation'
Major incident management 'ml_sn_global_similar_incidents_mim' Incident management 'ml_incident_categorization','ml_incident_assignment'
*/ var solutionArr = ['ml_setup_topics_model', 'ml_sn_itsm_nlu_itsm_nlu_for_va', 'ml_sn_csm_nlu_customer_service_nlu_model', 'ml_sn_hr_nlu_hr_nlu', 'ml_sn_global_all_similar_cases', 'ml_sn_global_recommended_resolved_cases', 'ml_sn_global_major_issue_detector', 'ml_sn_global_recommended_open_cases', 'ml_sn_global_articles_similar_to_cases', 'ml_sn_global_knowledge_similar_articles','ml_sn_global_similar_open_incidents', 'ml_sn_global_similar_resolved_incidents', 'ml_sn_global_similar_incidents', 'ml_sn_global_articles_similar_to_incidents', 'ml_sn_global_major_incident_recommendation','ml_sn_global_similar_incidents_mim','ml_incident_categorization','ml_incident_assignment']; new MLSchemaFixScriptHelper().fixMLSchemaforOrlandoUpgrade(solutionArr, 'exclude'); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-08-15 17:53:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0248a3cd5317b300d1dcddeeff7b1241</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Move ML definition to new schema</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Predictive Intelligence" source="com.glide.platform_ml">c41430683c31311068bcf327dfe37f28</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_0248a3cd5317b300d1dcddeeff7b1241</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-11-11 20:16:59</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Move ML definition to new schema
